component.name: TomatoTask
component.summary: An intuitive Pomodoro timer with integrated TodoList

description.p: TomatoTask is a powerful productivity application that combines the Pomodoro Technique with task management. Boost your focus and productivity with customizable work sessions, breaks, and comprehensive task tracking.

ul.li: Customizable Pomodoro timer with work sessions and breaks
Integrated task management with project organization
Track your productivity with daily and weekly statistics
Multi-language support (English, French, Spanish, Italian, German)

screenshot.caption: Main timer interface with task management

ul.li: Fixed Linux AppImage black screen issue by removing external Google Fonts dependency
Added proper Content Security Policy for better security
Updated HTML metadata and synchronized version numbers
